data.title: Loops '05
data.text:
How to get there:

Take the train Regionalexpress number RE1 from Potsdam main station into the direction of Eisenhüttenstatt or Frankfurt Oder at track 4. This train leaves Potsdam main station each hour at 21 minutes past and 9 minutes to. After about half an hour you will reach the station Berlin-Alexanderplatz. Get out off the train and follow the signs for the underground line number U2 (5 minutes walk). Then take the underground U2 into the direction of Pankow and leave at the stop Eberswalder Strasse, the third stop after Alexanderplatz. Take the exit on the left, after passing the stairs leave the snack point to your left and turn right again. You should cross the traffic light at the street Schönhauser Allee. There are lots of pubs, cafes and restaurants at the streets Pappelallee, Lychener Strasse, Schliemannstrasse, Raumerstrasse and at the Helmholzplatz.

In order to return to Potsdam main station, take the train RE1 from Berlin-Alexanderplatz into the direction of Magdeburg or Brandenburg leaving the station Berlin-Alexanderplatz each hour at 7 minutes past and 13 minutes to. Leave this train at Potsdam-HBF.

Be aware that the last train leaving Berlin-Alexanderplatz is at 12:37pm.

How to get there:

Take the train Regionalexpress number RE1 from Potsdam main station into the direction of Eisenhüttenstatt or Frankfurt Oder at track 4. This train leaves Potsdam main station each hour at 21 minutes past and 9 minutes to. After about half an hour you will reach the station Berlin-Alexanderplatz. Get off the train and go to the tracks 1 and 2 where the Sbahn is located. Then you take the Sbahns S5 into the direction of Strausberg Nord, S7 into the direction of Ahrensfelde, S9 in to the direction of Berlin-Schönefeld. Leave the Sbahn at the station Warschauer Strasse (3rd stop after Alexanderplatz). Take the exit on the left hand side and follow the Warschauer Strasse until you reach the Street Revaler Strasse on your right. Follow this street and take the second street on the left. This is the Street Simon-Dach-Strasse where lots of pubs, cafes and restaurants are located. Furthermore, if you follow the Simon-Dach-Strasse and take the second street on your right (Krossener-Str.), you will reach the Boxenhagenerplatz where you will find more pubs, cafes and restaurants.

In order to return to Potsdam main station, take the train RE1 from Berlin-Alexanderplatz into the direction of Magdeburg or Brandenburg leaving the station Berlin-Alexanderplatz each hour at 7 minutes past and 13 minutes to. Leave this train at Potsdam-HBF.

Be aware that the last train leaving Berlin-Alexanderplatz is at 12:37pm.
